name: ListenMoneyMatters
0:
”Alexa, open Listen Money Matters”
”Alexa, start Listen Money Matters”
”Alexa, ask Listen Money Matters”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: listen money matters
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Honest and uncensored - this is not your father’s boring finance show. This show brings much needed ACTIONABLE advice to a people who hate being lectured about personal finance from the out-of-touch one percent. Andrew and Matt are relatable, funny, and brash. Their down-to-earth discussions about money are entertaining whether you’re a financial whiz or just starting out. To be a part of the show and get your financial questions answered, send an email to listenmoneymatters@gmail.com.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Listen Money Matters to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Listen Money Matters to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
